title: SAV dataset inquiry
body:
Congrats on your excellent work! I would like to clarify the SAV dataset details:

You mentioned about sam_v_full should be downloaded from meta/SA-V dataset page, which provides the link of downloading sav_000.tar - sav_055.tar; should we unzip them and put these files under sam_v_full directory as sub directories?

Thanks for your clarification!
author: Ruining0916
